content: I'm glad you're considering the zigzag stitch method. I've heard that it's a good alternative to serging, especially when working with delicate fabrics like velvet and lace. Speaking of which, I've been experimenting with natural dyes lately, and indigo was another natural ingredient I utilized to achieve an interesting shade in my yarn dyeing experiment. I'm thinking of using that yarn to knit a pair of socks. Have you ever worked with naturally dyed yarns or fabrics? Do you think they'd be suitable for a quilt like mine?
